name: sidecar
description: Privacy Pass sidecar (TypeScript): batch mint + cache + HTTP API

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node esbuild.config.mjs && node dist/index.cjs
scripts.pkg: npm run build && pkg dist/index.cjs --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --out-path bin
